column2: SELECT TOP # s.apogee_id, a.teff, a.teff_err, sp.Halpha2#cont, sp.Halpha2#err, specobj.targetType, specobj.subclass, dbo.fApogeeAspcapFlagN (a.aspcapflag) , dbo.fApogeeStarFlagN (s.starflag) FROM apogeeStar s JOIN aspcapStar a on a.apstar_id = s.apstar_id JOIN apogeeObject obj on a.target_id = obj.target_id CROSS APPLY dbo.fGetNearestSpecObjEq (s.ra, s.dec, #) AS near JOIN specObj on near.specObjID = specobj.specObjID JOIN SPPlines sp on specobj.specObjID = sp.specObjID WHERE (a.aspcapflag & dbo.fApogeeAspcapFlag (#) ) = # and s.extratarg = # and specobj.class = # and sp.Halpha2#cont > # ORDER BY a.teff desc
